meta.title: Peter Baston
meta.description:
Pete Baston is an independent creative director and designer based in Los Angeles, California.
His practice is multidisciplinary, often working on many different parts of a brand with clients. 
Areas of focus are conceptualizing identity systems, ad campaigns, packaging, websites, and apps.

Pete has collaborated closely with a diverse group of global companies within luxury, entertainment, fashion, technology, action sports, food & beverage, data, and communications markets.
meta.name: Pete Baston
